description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A small 2D stadium with a quick gravitational hiccup to get things moving in a new way, a few over eager players to kick a ball about and you are playing 'Melon Madness'.  In 'Tournament' mode, take on the rookies and work your way to the pros for a challenge that only fools and heroes would rise to.  In 'Exhibition' mode, invite a friend for co-op or VS gameplay with up to 4 players (2 Vs 2).
